segment.source: Additional Windows Defender ATP configuration settings
segment.target: Additional Windows Defender ATP configuration settings

segment.source: Use the Group Policy Console to configure settings that enable sample sharing from your endpoints.
segment.target: Use the Group Policy Console to configure settings that enable sample sharing from your endpoints.

segment.source: These settings are used in the deep analysis feature.
segment.target: These settings are used in the deep analysis feature.

segment.source: Additional Windows Defender ATP configuration settings
segment.target: Additional Windows Defender ATP configuration settings

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14332 or later
segment.target: Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14332 or later

segment.source: Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection (Windows Defender ATP)
segment.target: Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection (Windows Defender ATP)

segment.source: [Some information relates to pre-released product which may be substantially modified before it's commercially released.
segment.target: [Some information relates to pre-released product which may be substantially modified before it's commercially released.

segment.source: Microsoft makes no warranties, express or implied, with respect to the information provided here.]
segment.target: Microsoft makes no warranties, express or implied, with respect to the information provided here.]

segment.source: You can use Group Policy (GP) to configure settings, such as settings for the sample sharing used in the deep analysis feature.
segment.target: You can use Group Policy (GP) to configure settings, such as settings for the sample sharing used in the deep analysis feature.

segment.source: Configure sample collection settings with Group Policy
segment.target: Configure sample collection settings with Group Policy

segment.source: On your GP management machine, copy the following files from the configuration package:
segment.target: On your GP management machine, copy the following files from the configuration package:

segment.source: a.
segment.target: a.

segment.source: Copy AtpConfiguration.admx into C:WindowsPolicyDefinitions
segment.target: Copy AtpConfiguration.admx into C:WindowsPolicyDefinitions

segment.source: b.
segment.target: b.

segment.source: Copy AtpConfiguration.adml into C:WindowsPolicyDefinitionsen-US
segment.target: Copy AtpConfiguration.adml into C:WindowsPolicyDefinitionsen-US

segment.source: Open the Group Policy Management Console, right-click the GPO you want to configure and click Edit.
segment.target: Open the Group Policy Management Console, right-click the GPO you want to configure and click Edit.

segment.source: In the Group Policy Management Editor, go to Computer configuration.
segment.target: In the Group Policy Management Editor, go to Computer configuration.

segment.source: Click Policies, then Administrative templates.
segment.target: Click Policies, then Administrative templates.

segment.source: Click Windows components and then Windows Advanced Threat Protection.
segment.target: Click Windows components and then Windows Advanced Threat Protection.

segment.source: Choose to enable or disable sample sharing from your endpoints.
segment.target: Choose to enable or disable sample sharing from your endpoints.

segment.target: Related topics

segment.target: Configure Windows Defender ATP endpoints

segment.target: Configure endpoint proxy and Internet connectivity settings
